name: Premier Audio & Video
overview:
Commercial AV Design Premier Audio & Video specializes in commercial audio/visual systems and provides everything from the initial consultation to design, wiring, and installation of complete media systems. This includes HDTV installation, projector and screen mounting, lighting control, sound speaker installation and more.

Premier Audio & Video services the entire Dallas and Ft. Worth metroplex, including Rockwall, Richardson, Sunnyvale, Plano, Frisco, and Allen.

We specialize in home theater installation, media room installation, conference rooms, amenity rooms, security systems, CCTV, access control, in-wall speaker installation, whole house audio and more. If you need any sort of audio, video or security need, we can meet it.
